resources.string:
1. Click on the Contestant 's Name. 

 2. Choose a Criterion for judging the contestant.

 3. Rate the Contestant from 0-10 rating scale (0 is the lowest and 10 is the highest) then click the check (✔️).

 4. The same procedure with other criteria. After rating all criteria, click the "Done" to rate other contestants.

 5. You can still go back anytime to edit the scores of the contestants as long as the contest category is not finished.
